item.name: Age of Steam Expansion #1: England & Ireland
Article 27: The UN Security Council Game
Carcassonne
item.comment: Good for 4 players. But bad for 6 players, the game is too slow

item.name: Civilization
item.comment: Good idea, but it takes time to play with it, and it's a little bit too complicated

item.name: Cluedo Super Sleuth
item.conditiontext: I have bought two pieces of this game. As it is OUT OF PRINT, if anyone one is interested, please inform me and propose a trade :)

item.name: Felix: The Cat in the Sack
Hotel Tycoon
item.comment: The model buildings are nice. This game is easy to learn, good for players of all ages. Strategies, co-operative skills and luck are all necessary for victory.

item.name: Louis XIV
item.comment:
YSD
An innovative game. Though the preparation is quite tedious, the game is overall interesting with some strategies needed. More suitable for 3 to 4 players

item.name: Power Grid: The New Power Plant Cards
The Princes of Florence
item.comment:
No card
Damn boring. Won without reason. Slept for 2 hours without anything funny. Complicated rules totally non-sense. Bad design at all. Worst buy of my own collection

item.name: Saint Petersburg: New Society & Banquet Expansion
Scotland Yard
item.comment: Good~ it is a good game and easily found at shopping malls in HK

item.name: Ticket to Ride: Europe
item.comment:
Very good game, especially for 4-5 people playing.
It would be better if they can add expansions. For advanced players, please change the rule to "connect the most cities" instead of shuffling tickets

item.name: The Werewolves of Miller's Hollow: New Moon
